title: Hobby Lobby Weekly Ad
text: Shop Our Weekly Ad Valid through February 8, 2026 Home Decor 50%off Items Labeled "Textiles" Does not include Seasonal Department or items labeled Kitchen, Bath, Closet, Gift or "Your Price" Football Party, Valentine's Day, St. Patrick's, Summer and items labeled The Spring Shop® are not included in Home Decor sale Doormats & Rugs 50%off Sheet Sets 50%off Bath Towels 50%off Window Curtains 50%off Comforter Sets 50%off Quilt Sets 50%off Bath Mats 50%off Shower Curtains 50%off Pillows & Throws 50%off Valentine Party, Crafts & Decorations 40%off Home Decor, Paper Plates & Napkins, Party Supplies, Fabric and More Does not include candy or food St. Patrick's 40%off Decorations, Party Supplies, Crafts, Fabric and More Items Labeled The Spring Shop 40%off LED Pathway Lights, Planters, Yard Signs, Yard Spinners, Wall Decor, Wind Chimes, Metal Statuary, and More.
